Dialogue.Page: The ship dock used in the Lake Core was made by Shoe prior to the Jam for another mod.
A few sounds were taken from FreeSounds, by smokinghotdog.
Special thanks to John Corby, Triffid, xen, and Idiot on the Outer Wilds Modding Discord for answering many questions we had about development.
Thanks to the New Horizons mod team as well. Without them, there is no way we could have made this mod within this time frame.
